item.title: Stack Using Linked List
item.description: Question Write a code to implement Stack using Linked List Algorithm It’s so simple to implement because stack uses LIFO and thats why we use insertAtBegin function only for inserting elements.

item.title: Polynomial Addition Using Linked List
item.description: Add two polynomials using Linked List Algorithm Recursive Approach (Easy) If both the numbers are null then return. else if compare the power, if same then add the coefficients and recursively call

item.title: Menu Driven Program For Doubly Linked List
item.description: Question Write a menu driven program in C++ to perform the following operations on double linked list. insert a node at the beginning of the list.
